description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
40428 - Support reading and writing Page Setup options of HTML file format
 
Exceptions
41955 - Exception “Object reference not set to an instance of an object” occurred when re-saving a template XLS file
41931 - CellsException calculating SUBSTITUTE function
41925 - Exception during the PivotTable.RefreshData() method call
 
Bugs
41940 - Errors and formatting issues in the generated PDF
41933 - Black background when merging / adding sheets in the output PDF format
41932 - Unable to convert specific XLS to PDF format
41884 - Output TIF image is not correct
41865 - Converting Excel to MHTML issue(s)
41732 - Left cell overlaps into the right cell (XLS to HTML conversion)
41662 - Right- to-Left problem in saving as HTML or MHT file format
40956 - Conditional formatting fails when saving workbook as HTML format
41978 - Pivot table seems to be using the cell’s Bold setting when converting to PDF file format
41972 - Pivot table headers in compact form is using the header from Tabular/Outline form
41969 - Pivot table headers with the wrong color in PDF format
41949 - Subtotal entry in Pivot table is in the wrong column in the output PDF
41944 - Calculated fields are not calculated if the source worksheet is removed
41927 - Item label filters to only display ‘TRUE’ items is not working in the converted PDF file
41908 - Day of week ordered incorrectly in the output PDF format
41885 - Calculated field is not working / calculating correctly in Pivot tables
41775 - Repeat item labels Pivot table setting is not used in the converted PDF
41963 - Pivot table shows ‘#DIV/0!’ in value columns that are set to Average, AVERAGEIF formulas
41939 - XLS file will not open without errors after removing Ole objects
41936 - Saving XLSX file results in unreadable content
41930 - Page Setup issue / problem which results in corrupted file
41929 - Array formulas do not retain references to columns in the same table
41914 - Corrupt files when merging workbooks
41909 - COUNTIFS formula is not calculated correctly when converting to PDF
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
